title: New: Oddnesse – I Used To
body:
There’s a real sense of wistful self-dependence to this newest single from LA’s **Oddnesse**.

An ode to moving on from a relationship that perhaps wasn’t as perfect as it once appeared, _I Used To_ is a real powerful statement, a homage to being content with oneself, instead of continually searching for approval in the arms of another. Check it out below.
